About the Company: KLRF Limited is an India-based company. The Company operates in two segments: food division, textile division and engineering division. The Companys food division product includes Maida, atta and wheat. The Companys textile division product includes Ring Spun Yarn and Open End Spun Yarn. The Companys Wind Mill Division at Aralvoimozhi Village in Kanyakumari District, Pazhavoor Village and Dhanukkarkulam Vilalge in Tirunelveli District, Tamil Nadu with a capacity of 6.25 megawatt..The company also in the business activities of Food Division, Textile Division, Engineering Division.
